frameDefinitions: An Entity has a particular scalar Attribute with a value exceeding a contextually-specified or generally-understood standard.
An Arguer presents a Content, along with Support, to an Addressee.
A Driver prepares a Vehicle for travel by placing it in the normal location for the operation of the vehicle or by detaching it from a place where it was held.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
An Agent acts to begin the life of a Process.
An Agent causes a Firearm to discharge which induces the rapid motion of the Projectile.
frameExamples: Jan <t>argued</t> that the evidence was inadmissable.
Throughout Irish history, countless generations of exiles have <t>cast</t> <t>off</t> from the shores of Ireland.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
After discovering her knack for organization, she decided to try to  <t>launch</t> a career in human resources.
The bank robber <t>shot</t> at the clerks with an AK-47.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Value</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Value</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.

The <fen>Arguer</fen> wants the <fen>Addressee</fen> to entertain the <fen>Content</fen>, which can be a proposition to be believed or a course of action to be taken, based on the <fen>Support</fen> presented.
The <fen>Arguer</fen> presents the <fen>Content</fen> before the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
The Time at which an <fen>Arguer</fen> makes an argument for the <fen>Content</fen>.
This role identifies the location where an argument is made by an <fen>Arguer</fen>.
This is the being, typically human, that prepares the <fen>Vehicle</fen> for motion, and will control it once it is in motion.
The device--such as a car, boat, spaceship,. etc.--which is used for transport and is prepared for travel by the <fen>Driver</fen>.
Any expression which describes the location that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> has been stationed at.
The  <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Driver</fen> prepares the <fen>Vehicle</fen> for motion.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the <fen>Driver</fen> prepares the <fen>Vehicle</fen> for motion.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate the process that the <fen>Agent</fen> initiates.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the actor responsible for starting the <fen>Process</fen>.
This role is for the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> initiates the <fen>Process</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Process</fen> is initiated.
The entity whose rapid, dangerous motion is caused by the Agent and/or Firearm.
The Agent is the person performing the intentional act causing the motion of the Projectile.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the shooting event takes place.
The location in which the shooting event takes place.
listRoleExamples: Jan argued <fex>that the evidence was inadmissable</fex>.
<fex>Jan</fex> argued that the evidence was inadmissable.
The government argued <fex>in August</fex> that the prisoners should not be released
The young men will be arguing their policies <fex>in the school auditorium</fex>.
<fex>He</fex> shook his head in amazement and slowly pulled the car out of the parking lot.
Lyle was feeling very pleased with himself as he pulled <fex>the BMW</fex> out of its parking space.
We weighed anchor <fex>in the afternoon of October 9th</fex> and got out of the harbour under all plain sail.
At 0900 on 10 September 1945, DE 353 weighed anchor <fex>in Victoria Harbor</fex>, adjacent to Labuan Island, Borneo.
The robbers shot at the clerks <fex>as they ran out of the bank</fex>
The bankrobbers were crazy enough to shoot at the clerks with an AK-47 <fex>inside the bank</fex>
